nodes.text: The Grand Theljian snow dog was a type of large dog that could be kept as a pet. The dogs possessed six stocky legs, two sets of eyes, and a wide mouth, but had small ears. The creatures' heads nearly reached the height of an adult human. Xylan Graf, scion of the Graf family, owned a Grand Theljian snow dog named Plinka, who liked to trick strangers into believing she was a chair.
